description: This file defines functions for generating RPC-related source code, particularly for emitting event handlers, RPC registration and deregistration functions, and version information for a JSON-RPC based system. It includes code for constructing function prototypes, handling parameters serialization/deserialization, and managing namespace scoping for generated code.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates source code for an event emission function, including serialization of parameters, handling send-if logic, and namespace scoping.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Produces the prologue code for the RPC source files, handling includes, namespace declarations, and versioning setup.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Outputs the closing namespace and cleanup code for the RPC source files.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Generates namespace-scoped constants for version information.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Coordinates emission of RPC registration functions, including version and event registration, handling header/source differences.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main entry to generate full RPC source code including prologue, body, and epilogue.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Produces version-related code within the RPC source, encapsulating version namespace and constants.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
